channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy If anything is sediti
item.description: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy If anything is seditious or anti-national or vulgar, there are laws to check that... Eventually, every state government will use vendetta through this mechanism: Suhel Seth, Columnist #IndiaUpfront #SocialMediaPolicy

item.title: Full story https://shorturl.at/CSBN3 || Princess Sudhira d
item.description: Full story https://shorturl.at/CSBN3 || Princess Sudhira defied tradition by marrying the love of her life, a British man, despite being betrothed to a young Indian prince.

item.title: Policy apnao, paisa kamao! What is U.P's new social media po
item.description: Policy apnao, paisa kamao! What is U.P's new social media policy all about? How does it impact common citizens? Watch @NavikaKumar's take on this on #NewzWithNavika
